accessibility.onboarding.screen.title:
Welcome to §7Fabulously Optimized§r! Here are some tips.

§f🪟§r Connected Textures and Dynamic Lights can be configured in §7Mods§r
§a🏞§r Better Grass and full screen with Alt+Tab support can be enabled in §7Video Settings§r
§e✨§r Shaders and resource pack features are supported, just §7download and enable§r
§5🎮§r §7Connect§r a game controller to use that instead of the keyboard
§3🛜§r Press §7Open to Internet§r in singleplayer to play with friends, anywhere
§8📸§r Press §7F9§r to take a big 4K-screenshot
§6🏴§r Get a free cape or use your existing one: §7https://download.fo/cape§r
§b🌐§r Help translate the modpack to your language: §7https://download.fo/translate§r
§2➕§r Add more mods with these simple instructions: §7https://download.fo/add§r
§4❓§r Problems or questions? Check out our wiki: §7https://download.fo/wiki§r

(§7Maximize window§r to see full text or visit §7https://download.fo/tutorial§r)
